com.facebook.litho

Class ThreadPoolLayoutHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.ThreadPoolLayoutHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LithoHandler

    public class ThreadPoolLayoutHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements LithoHandler
    LithoHandler implementation that uses a thread pool to calculate the layout.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultInstance

        public static ThreadPoolLayoutHandler getDefaultInstance()
        Gets the default static singleton reference to ThreadPoolLayoutHandler. It is preferred to use the default thread pool in order prevent the app creating too many threads.
        Returns:
        default ThreadPoolLayoutHandler.

      • getNewInstance

        public static ThreadPoolLayoutHandler getNewInstance(LayoutThreadPoolConfiguration configuration)
        Creates a new ThreadPoolLayoutHandler with the provided configuration. This method will create a new ThreadPoolExecutor which can negatively affect the performance of the app.
        Parameters:
        configuration - LayoutThreadPoolConfiguration specifying core and max pool size, and thread priority
        Returns:
        new instance with a separate ThreadPoolExecutor with specified configuration.
